dependencies.description:
Faiss is a library for efficient similarity search and clustering of
dense vectors. Faiss contains algorithms that search in sets of vectors
of any size, up to ones that possibly do not fit in RAM. It also
contains supporting code for evaluation and parameter tuning. Faiss is
written in C++ with complete wrappers for Python/numpy. Some of the most
useful algorithms are implemented on the GPU. It is developed by
Facebook AI Research.
dependencies.name: faiss

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.
dependencies.name: py-pyyaml

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
dynim is a pure-python package to perform dynamic-importance (DynIm)
sampling on a high-dimensional data set.
name: py-dynim
